text.v: Cập nhật số lượng sản phẩm theo bộ phận

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @message nvarchar(4000), @user int, @admin bit, @language char(1), @sys varchar(32) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @language = @@language, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName' select @message = case @language when 'v' then N'Dữ liệu trong tệp không có hoặc không hợp lệ.' else N'The content of the data file is empty or invalid.' end
create table #r(ma_bp varchar(32), ma_sp varchar(32), so_luong numeric(19, 4), dien_giai nvarchar(512), stt int)
select @q = 'insert into #r select a.ma_bp, a.ma_sp, a.so_luong, a.dien_giai, a.stt ' select @q = @q + 'from @@table a join hrbp b on a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp where b.ma_dvcs = ''' + replace(@ma_dvcs, '''', '''''') + '''' exec sp_executesql @q
--Result if exists(select 1 from #r) begin select '' as message, 'this.frameElement.result = @@result;parent.set$Grid$ImportResult(this.frameElement);' as script select rtrim(a.ma_bp) as ma_bp, case @language when 'v' then b.ten_bp else b.ten_bp2 end as ten_bp, rtrim(a.ma_sp) as ma_sp, case @language when 'v' then c.ten_sp else c.ten_sp2 end as ten_sp, a.so_luong, a.dien_giai from #r a left join hrbp b on a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp left join hrdmsp c on a.ma_sp = c.ma_sp order by a.stt return end else begin select @message as message return end
